response.summary:
Professional Profile
I am a professional in Agricultural Engineering from the National University of Colombia, I have management capacity to lead sustainable development processes in different human activities. I have an experience in leading teams as a Team Manager at Amazon for the last three years, achieving the business objectives and a mastering of the role. As a leader I have developed leadership skills necessary how to have tough conversations, knows and communicates the Amazon mission, vision and strategy, maintains a high level of professionalism and approachability.

Experience
Amazon Team Manager. I have achieved great performance and good behaviors through effective coaching within my teams. As a Team Manager I have Experience directly leading a team(s) of people from BR, NASP, MX markets at Amazon in different departments, Experience interviewing and selecting people for DART. As a TM I have had the opportunity to help in growth processes from l2 to l4 and currently leading the first group of L3 acting supervisors for the DART Brazilian market.  During my career as a TM I have had several recognitions at CSDiscovery, performances and for the 360leader program carried out in 2021 as TM of the month in March.
response.skills: Gestión de proyectos, Ingeniería Agrícola, Redacción de textos técnicos, ArcGIS, sap 2000, Microsoft Excel, Matlab, Inglés, Portugués

profile_positions.description: as a team manager for the last years I have achieved great performance and good behaviors through effective coaching within my team at Amazon from the Brazilian market.
profile_positions.title: Team manager

profile_positions.description: Soporte del mercado brasilero de Amazon
profile_positions.title: CSA

profile_positions.description: Desempeñé ensayos experimentales, seguimientos y  funciones relacionadas con tareas en el laboratorio de Poscosecha de la Universidad Nacional de Colombia, que hacían parte de proyectos del Corredor Tecnológico Agroindustrial.
profile_positions.title: Estudiante Auxiliar, Universidad Nacional de Colombia

company.name: Amazon
company.description:
Amazon is guided by four principles: customer obsession rather than competitor focus, passion for invention, commitment to operational excellence, and long-term thinking. We are driven by the excitement of building technologies, inventing products, and providing services that change lives. We embrace new ways of doing things, make decisions quickly, and are not afraid to fail. We have the scope and capabilities of a large company, and the spirit and heart of a small one.

Together, Amazonians research and develop new technologies from Amazon Web Services to Alexa on behalf of our customers: shoppers, sellers, content creators, and developers around the world.

Our mission is to be Earth's most customer-centric company. Our actions, goals, projects, programs, and inventions begin and end with the customer top of mind.

You'll also hear us say that at Amazon, it's always "Day 1."​ What do we mean? That our approach remains the same as it was on Amazon's very first day - to make smart, fast decisions, stay nimble, invent, and focus on delighting our customers.
